title: After-School Secret Club
alternative_title: 放課後ひみつクラブ ; Houkago Himitsu Club ; After-School Secret Club
status: 放課後ひみつクラブ ; Houkago Himitsu Club ; After-School Secret Club
description:
Description :
        Yuichi Nekota enters the giant school city "Private Eucalyptus Leaf Academy". Excited about his new life, he meets Chitose Arikasaki, a girl who investigates the mysteries of the school! The two form the 'After School Secret Club', and today they continue their search for the truth!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: The Secret Of The School Emblem
Vol.1 Chapter 1.2: Case 1 (Second Half): The Secret Of The Baseball Club
Vol.1 Chapter 1.1: Case 1 (First Half): The Secret Of The Mysteriously Dazzling Girl
